Instance.description: Zone Director for the Pool Venue.

Tunable.name: place_all_user_sims_in_same_arrival_situation
Tunable.display: Place All User Sims In Same Arrival Situation
Tunable.description: If this is enabled then all user sims will be placed in the same situation instead of each in their own situation.

Tunable.name: place_travel_companion_in_same_arrival_situation
Tunable.display: Place Travel Companion In Same Arrival Situation
Tunable.description: If this is enabled, the travel companion will put into the same situation with user sims. If this checked, place_all_user_sims_in_same_arrival_situation has to be True as well or there will be unit test error.

TunableTuple.name: special_pool_schedule
TunableTuple.description: The schedule to trigger pool scheduled events (e.g. parties, etc)

TunableList.name: schedule_entries
TunableList.description: A list of event schedules. Each event is a mapping of days of the week to a start_time and duration.

TunableTuple.description: A schedule. Define availability for days of the week. For the set of specified days, define an hour of the day and a duration, in hours. Optionally, specified if the start time is random within the tuned window.

TunableTuple.name: days_available
TunableTuple.description: Which days of the week to include

Tunable.name: duration
Tunable.description: Duration of this work session in hours.

TunableVariant.name: multi_day_career_days_at_work
TunableVariant.display: Multi Day Career Days At Work
TunableVariant.description: This tunable should only be used with multi-day rabbitholes. If you are not sure about whether this should be used for the career you are tuning, please check with your GPE partner. Set the days the Sim should be at their multi-day career here. Used for setting values in UI.

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: Which days of the week to include

TunableVariant.name: multi_day_career_start_and_end_days
TunableVariant.display: Multi Day Career Start And End Days
TunableVariant.description: This tunable should only be used with multi-day rabbitholes. If you are not sure about whether this should be used for the career you are tuning, please check with your GPE partner. Used to tell the UI which days the multi-day career starts and ends on.

TunableEnum.name: end_day
TunableEnum.description: The day the multi-day career ends.

TunableEnum.name: start_day
TunableEnum.description: The day the multi-day career starts.

Tunable.name: random_start
Tunable.description: If checked, this schedule will have a random start time in the tuned window each time.

TunableEnum.name: schedule_shift_type
TunableEnum.description: Shift Type for the schedule, this will be used for validations.

Tunable.name: situation
Tunable.description: The situation to start according to the tuned schedule.

TunableTuple.name: start_time
TunableTuple.description: An Hour(24Hr) and Minute representing a time relative to the beginning of a day.

TunableVariant.name: travel_companion_arrival_situation
TunableVariant.description: If enabled then Sims that aren't controllable that travel with the users Sims will be placed in the tuned situation on arrival. If place_travel_companion_in_same_arrival_situation is checked, this needs to be disable or there will be unit test error.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: If the user invites NPC's to travel with them to this lot then this is the situation that they will be added to.

Tunable.name: user_sim_arrival_situation
Tunable.description: The situation to place all of the Sims from the users household in when they arrive.
